option.immersive_armors.hudCompassXOffha: X offset of the HUD clock with used offhand.
option.immersive_armors.hudClockXOffhand: X offset of the HUD clock with used offhand.
option.immersive_armors.mobEntityUseImme: Chance of entity wearing Immersive Armor.
option.immersive_armors.lootChance: Chance of finding Immersive Armor in loot.
option.immersive_armors.hudCompassY: Y offset of the HUD compass.
option.immersive_armors.hudCompassX: X offset of the HUD compass.
option.immersive_armors.hudClockY: Y offset of the HUD clock.
option.immersive_armors.hudClockX: X offset of the HUD clock.
